column1: For these reasons, I am of the strong view  that this is a fit
Accordingly,  I  set  aside  all  the  proceedings  in  the  District

column2: to intervene in the partition action No. 389/00/P and to file
a statement of claim. The petitioner is entitled to recover Rs.
